es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.exe
Class ExternalExecutionManager

java.lang.Object
  es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.exe.ExternalExecutionManager

public class ExternalExecutionManager
extends java.lang.Object

A thrid-party applications manager to control proccesses running on the machine and kill them when necessary.

Since:
3.0
